Malice/ Injustice/ Hellplague:

Malice nodded and followed Blacknightmare, casting a cold glance at 
the clone.

Injustice stood up straight and lost his mad expression.  He cleared 
his throat and spoke to the rest of the minions.
"He doesn't get out much does he?" he inquired, much to the suprise 
of the others.

The Sweep commander lead Darkfate down to one of the lower staging 
areas where a bunch of the Sweeps were waiting.  
"We must strike hard and fast.  We must attack the cannon fast enough 
to delay any counter attack from the Maximals.  Any questions before 
we leave?"
